name: chatgpt-word-copier
description: Chrome extension to copy ChatGPT responses with formulas for MS Word

scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run build:firefox
scripts.version: node scripts/version.mjs && git add src/manifest.json src/manifest.firefox.json
scripts.package: node scripts/version.mjs && node scripts/build.mjs && node scripts/package.mjs
scripts.package:firefox: node scripts/version.mjs && node scripts/build.mjs --firefox && node scripts/package.mjs --firefox
scripts.package:all: npm run package && npm run package:firefox
scripts.submit:firefox: npm run build:firefox && npx web-ext sign --source-dir=dist-firefox --channel=listed --approval-timeout=0
